columns.text:
One bedroom 15 square meters with 1 double (matrimonia) bed and one separate living room 14 square meters with sitting area. Private bathroom with shower and private balcony with garden view.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

Type: Room up to 2 persons / 29 square meters

Quantity: 1

View: Garden

Location: First floor

Bed: One Queen

Bathrooms: 1 bathroom with rain shower
Up to 2 Guests/ Garden View

sizes: col-md-12 p-0 three-col px-3 px-sm-0 animation--up

items.title: Master Suite
items.description: One bedroom 16 square meters with 1 matrimonial bed and a separate large living area 19 square meters that can accommodate up to 2 more guests (extra charge), private bathroom with bath tub and 2 private balconies one with pool view and one with garden view.

items.title: Family Suite
items.description: One bedroom 23 square meters with 1 king size bed and 1 sofa bed, and one small separate bedroom 5 square meters with 1 more sofa bed, private bathroom with shower and private balcony with mountain view. The family suite can be equipped upon request with extra facilities for children (milk warmer, kettle etc).

The family suite can be equipped upon request with extra facilities for children (milk warmer, kettle etc).

items.seo_title: Superior Double Room | Rooms | Acqua Vatos Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Superior Double Room is a 1-bedroom 18 sq.m space, private balcony, large pool, near beach. Book this room today!

items.title: Economy Double Room
items.description: One bedroom 16 square meters with 1 double bed. These rooms are located on a lower ground level, a perfect choice for budget conscious travelers, who wish to explore Santorini while enjoying the comforts of a chic boutique hotel.
